about_the_game:
You are stranded with a spaceship and 100 bullets. You must use the resources that you have to learn more about the world and its inhabitants. As you venture further, you will encounter different missions, from helping fellow space travelers gather fuel to exploring the depths of infested mines. In Space Game, you lose everything upon death; as you play, you will learn various techniques for gathering money to regain progress faster.


You will run into multiple factions throughout your journey, the biggest two being the Pirates and the Federation. Your actions will affect your relationships with these factions as you play, so make sure not to make too many enemies.


Space Game allows you to find, buy, and win many different armor types. These armor types have many parameters that affect your speed, acceleration, hit points, collection radius, and fuel conversion.

short_description: In a vast universe where nothing is familiar, you must use your knowledge to progress and learn how to survive. Upgrade your spaceship and explore to your heart's content, or destroy everything that comes your way, all in classic retro style.
